document.full_text: but regardless of which way the voting goes in fifa's presidential election this summer, the big winner may be someone who isn't running: the former french star and current uefa president michel platini.
document.title: platini could be the big winner in fifa's election
lines_and_colors: but regardless of which way the voting goes in fifa's presidential election this summer, the big winner may be someone who isn't running: the former french star and current uefa president michel platini.
